snippet: At least 31 people were killed in a double bombing in the central city of Jos on Thursday at a market near a bus station where a similar attack killed dozens of people in May.
abstract: Double bombing in central Nigerian city Jos kills at least 31 people; region has been target of attacks by extremist group Boko Haram.
lead_paragraph: At least 31 people were killed in a double bombing in the central city of Jos on Thursday at a market near a bus station where a similar attack killed dozens of people in May.

headline.main: Nigeria: Bombings in Jos Kill at Least 31
